statements: SELECT * FROM employee_tracking;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours FROM employee_tracking;
SELECT employee_id, overtime_hours FROM employee_tracking ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, work_hours, overtime_hours FROM employee_tracking WHERE time_off_requests > 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employee_tracking;
SELECT * FROM employee_tracking WHERE work_hours > 40 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours, overtime_hours FROM employee_tracking WHERE time_off_requests < 3 ORDER BY work_hours DESC;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours + overtime_hours AS total_hours FROM employee_tracking WHERE work_hours >= 35 AND overtime_hours < 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_tracking WHERE time_off_requests >= 2 AND time_off_requests <= 5 ORDER BY time_off_requests ASC, work_hours DESC;
SELECT AVG(work_hours) AS average_work_hours, MAX(overtime_hours) AS max_overtime_hours FROM employee_tracking WHERE work_hours > 30 AND overtime_hours > 5;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE work_hours > 40;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours FROM employees ORDER BY work_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM time_off_requests WHERE reason = 'Vacation';
SELECT employee_name, overtime_hours FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date FROM time_off_requests ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, work_hours FROM employees WHERE work_hours > 40;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(work_hours) AS total_hours FROM employees GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours > 50;
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date, reason FROM employees e JOIN time_off_requests t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM time_off_requests WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM work_hours WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT employee_id, work_date FROM work_hours WHERE employee_id = 1001 ORDER BY work_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, start_date, end_date, reason FROM time_off_requests WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(hours_worked), MIN(hours_worked), AVG(hours_worked) FROM work_hours GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM time_off_requests GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_requests > 2;
SELECT employee_name, work_date, hours_worked FROM employees INNER JOIN work_hours ON employees.employee_id = work_hours.employee_id ORDER BY work_date ASC, hours_worked DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department, start_date FROM employees;
SELECT id, name, hourly_rate FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM work_hours WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM time_off_requests WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT name, department, start_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT name, start_date, hourly_rate FROM employees WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.name, w.date, w.hours_worked FROM employees e JOIN work_hours w ON e.id = w.employee_id WHERE w.hours_worked >= 8;
SELECT e.name, ot.date, ot.hours_overtime FROM employees e JOIN overtime ot ON e.id = ot.employee_id WHERE ot.hours_overtime > 0;
SELECT e.name, tor.start_date, tor.end_date, tor.reason FROM employees e JOIN time_off_requests tor ON e.id = tor.employee_id WHERE tor.status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM work_hours WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT full_name, hired_date FROM employees ORDER BY hired_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND hired_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.full_name, w.date, w.hours_worked FROM employees e INNER JOIN work_hours w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id WHERE w.hours_worked > 8;
SELECT e.full_name, o.reason FROM employees e INNER JOIN overtime o ON e.employee_id = o.employee_id WHERE o.hours_worked > 5 ORDER BY o.date ASC;

SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS num_employees FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name GROUP BY d.department_name HAVING num_employees > 3 ORDER BY num_employees DESC;
